posts.title: Emergency Closure Extended
posts.excerpt: The closure of Southport Pier has been extended as engineers continue to assess structural concerns. Council officials announced today that additional surveys are needed before any reopening date can be confirmed.

posts.title: Community Campaign Launches
posts.excerpt: Local residents and business owners have joined forces to launch a campaign to save Southport Pier. The initiative aims to raise awareness and lobby for immediate action to secure the pier's future.

posts.title: Heritage Status Could Help Secure Funding
posts.excerpt: Heritage experts suggest that Southport Pier's Grade II listed status could be key to securing additional funding for repairs. Historic England representatives have been invited to assess the structure.

posts.title: Future Plans Unveiled
posts.excerpt: Initial plans for the pier's renovation have been revealed, showing a modern vision while preserving its historic character. The proposals include improved accessibility and new visitor facilities.
